nodes.text: Ube-tel was the name of the ritual hunt, which was used to train initiates of Draethos Force-based tradition Keetael.

The Ube-tel had no set schedule. These hunts lasted for weeks, with one or more Keetael Masters leading up to a dozen initiates on ancient trails through the brutal wilderness of the planet Draethos. Early hunts focused on discovering the inherent abilities of the Keetael initiates, while later hunts increasingly focused on controlling abilities and learning how to use them efficiently.
